result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ
result.translation: Nyuma mumuboheshe umunyururu ufite uburebure bwa Dhira’a[1] mirongo irindwi.
result.footnotes: [1] Dhira’a ni bumwe mu buryo bwa kera bwifashishwaga mu gupima uburebure bw’ikintu. Dhira’a imwe ingana na santimetero hafi mirongo irindwi n’eshanu (75 cm).
